name: Great Race - Route 66
description:
Cruise across America on the famous Route 66, all the way from lush Illinois to the shores of California!

Choose your favourite Classic Car from a vintage collection and beat the competition, but remember to stop every now and then to enjoy the attractions along the way.

- Road trippin' at its finest!
- Boost and destroy opponents!
- Perform tricks, such as Barrel Roll, 360, Long Air, Crash and Destruction!
- Cruise through 8 U.S. states!
- Unlock all 15 vintage cars!
- See real attractions on Route 66!
- Experience dawns, days, sunsets and nights!
- Never lose your progress with iCloud Backups!

Be aware that after playing this game you might want to do the road trip in real life...
